name: Star of Destiny
description:
It's been a long and bitter winter, as you go to bed one night while snow falls outside you make a wish, that wish is for life when it was as simple as the winter of your childhood.

This is to be a tale of be careful what you wish, as you make your wish the Star of Dreams is overhead and inevitably grants you your wish.

The problem is with a wish comes a consequence and the magic that made it true has been corrupted, the place you are transported is ruled over by witch, your arrival makes her rather mad and in reply she sets about raising an army of snowmen.

You are elected as the saviour of the Star and so tasked with protecting the village and indeed the Star of Dreams itself. Grab an arsenal of seasonal weapons and surround yourself with towers or power and protect that Star.
